TextView.android:text: Visually inspect, exposed section of both RF and DC cables of GPS Clock, for any sign of damage
Ensure closure of all cable entry and exit points at equipment cabinets
Exhaust fans at rear side of OMSS console working normal
Clearing of wild growth near earth pits
Watering of all earth pits done
Measurement of Earth to Neutral Voltage
Check ground cable connections toCore Router1/2
Check ground cable connections to Patch panel 1/2
Check ground cable connections to GPS Clock
Check ground cable connections to CVSS/DCSS racks
Check the operation of PCU battery back up
a. Switch OFF both the MCBs catering to PCU (order should be first Secondary Supply and then Primary Supply) and check battery backup for 5 minutes
b. Switch onboth the MCBs catering to PCU (order should be first Primary Supply and then Secondary Supply)
Check ground cable connections to PCU
